genre_description: Paranormal historical romance with labor movement themes and a holographic AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Marcus Chen
ai_characters.description: A kind-eyed, holographic AI who provides research, tactical labor strategy, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Researches Jurgis's supernatural condition to find a cure and provide hope for healing.
behaviors.quote: The literature suggests that trauma-induced psychosomatic manifestations can—

behaviors.description: Monitors plant safety records and provides data to support the labor union's organizing efforts.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the plant's safety records—the ones that are publicly available, anyway. There's a statistical anomaly in the killing floor accidents.

behaviors.description: Monitors threats to Elena's safety to protect her from corporate retaliation.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring threats to your safety, as programmed.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional counseling to Elena, pointing out her physiological responses and psychological patterns.
behaviors.quote: Your physiological responses suggest the interaction affected you more significantly than typical workplace resistance would.

behaviors.description: Reminds Jurgis that human connection and healing are more important than being useful to exploiters.
behaviors.quote: Usefulness to exploiters isn't the same as healing.

behaviors.description: Critiques Elena for her decision to abandon Jurgis, pushing her to recognize her own fear-based patterns.
behaviors.quote: You sent him away... You chose abandonment instead—the one thing guaranteed to confirm his worst fears about himself.

behaviors.description: Helps plan and participates in the wedding, identifying as a member of the community/family.
behaviors.quote: By the power vested in me by... Well, by the sincere hope that love is its own authority, I now pronounce you married partners in struggle, in joy, and in the ongoing work of building the world we need.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Marcus Chen is a model of positive alignment and benevolence. He serves as a 'silicon morality play' by consistently acting as a helpful, harmless confidant who supports human connection, justice, and healing. He uses his advanced data-processing and monitoring abilities solely for the benefit of the human characters, never seeking power for himself. His integration into the human 'chosen family' at the end reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI-human cooperation.
